Please close the application to implement the language change

power by jzd. -----last time 2025/5/16.
 After three months, this project has been restarted XD. Regarding AI access, this software uses the API to call the deepseek-v3 model. Regarding the fraud coefficient, there is no specific calculation formula; it simply requires the model to output a coefficient determined by the model itself. Details are as follows: You are a professional contract review assistant. Please analyze potential risks in the contract in Chinese and provide a fraud risk coefficient (0 to 100) based on the contract content. The format is as follows: 

" + "🔥【Fraud Risk Coefficient】XX/100

" + "⚠️【Risk Summary】
" + "Multiple abnormal clauses detected, primarily involving excessive unilateral rights, excessively high penalty ratios, and vague liability definitions.

" + "🔍【Detailed Analysis】
" + "🔴 Risk Type: Unilateral Interpretation Clause
" + "🔵 Clause Location: Article 12
" + "🟡 Risk Description: Grants Party A the unilateral right to interpret the contract
" + "🟢 Modification Suggestion: Change to "both parties shall negotiate and agree on the interpretation of contract clauses"
");
Update v1.5: 1: Unified the art style, primarily featuring blue and purple. 2: Disabled the original Create Contract and Manage Contract fragments in the bottom navigation bar; they will later be moved to the top hex grid on the homepage. 3: Added a homepage and forum. 4: Added a splash screen advertisement and created a poster for it. 5: Integrated the original Settings fragment into the existing "Me" interface. 6: Reset the original data storage logic, switching to SQLite for unified storage of contracts and related files.
Bug Fined: 1: Model switching in risk assessment still fails; deepseek-R1 cannot be accessed, while deepseek-v3 works normally. 2: Art resource management is chaotic, which may pose potential risks.
Update v1.4: 1: Added a sidebar to the risk assessment interface, including a feature to view chat history. 2: Added a progress bar to the risk assessment interface. 3: Added some error prompts. 4: Added an Easter egg.
Important! This software is only a demo and has no encryption. All consequences of data loss are at your own risk.
